alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 12:23PM EST until February 08 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze expected. * WHERE...Southern Franklin and Southern Somerset Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will likely impact this evening`s and Tuesday morning`s commute. The snow may be heavy at wet and could lead to some power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of drizzle or freezing drizzle may occur before snow. Precipitation falling on cold, bare surfaces may lead to icy conditions despite air temperatures that may be above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset
